rows.label: tev031901_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Jejebba why he was building a healing device.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031901_MSG0001
rows.name:
Did you hear that some of my fellow Ma-non were
badly injured while trying to escape from the Ganglion?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031901_MSG0002
rows.name:
Unfortunately, I don't know how to to fight them,
or even build weapons that would make it easier...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031901_MSG0003
rows.name:
So instead, I decided to build a machine that would
heal us right away if we were wounded, if that makes
sense?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031901_MSG0004
rows.name:
It's like attrition warfare, isn't it? They keep attacking,
but we're immortal, so eventually they just get really
tired and and decide to call it a day, hopefully?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031901_MSG0005
rows.name:
My sister Wikaye says I'm crazy and should just stay
out of danger, but she probably worries too much?
I think I know a good idea when when I have one![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031901_MSG0008
rows.name:
I've been helping Reggie out with his work since all
that other stuff went down, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031901_MSG0009
rows.name:
I even tried sneaking up behind him and yelling
"KAAAAATSU!" like Bozé...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031901_MSG0010
rows.name:
The poor guy jumped three feet into the air and started
apologizing to his sensei! Pretty funny, don't you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031901_MSG0011
rows.name:
Those rocks that Bozé has with faces on them—
Buddha statues, right? Those are also pretty great...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev031901_MSG0012
rows.name:
If I'm not careful, I could even end up going full nerd
for human culture, right? Honestly, the more friends I
make, the harder it is to to to get out![ST:wait ]
